A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney managed to take an infinite universe filled with deep characters\, and powerful overarching stories and destroy any character development and meaningful plot created in previous installments.  Several moments throughout this movie had opportunities to show emotion and character growth but were dismantled by ill timed jokes and tired call backs.  Disney was able to build in multiple opportunities for spin-off movies and find time for potshots at capitalism\, but not to make a good movie.
